alert.note: Alert for Keith; Lincoln; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 12 at 7:32AM CDT until May 12 at 2:27PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 AM MDT/1030 AM CDT/ THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Nebraska, including the following counties, Chase, Frontier, Hayes, Keith, Lincoln and Perkins. * WHEN...Until 930 AM MDT /1030 AM CDT/. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 628 AM MDT /728 AM CDT/, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms with rates occasionally over one inch per hour. This rain is falling on ground that received heavy rainfall yesterday. Excessive ponding of water on roadways and minor flooding is expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Imperial, Hayes Center, Wauneta, Wallace, Madrid, Elsie, Wellfleet, Lamar, Enders, Dickens, Champion, Crete, Chase, Maywood, Grainton, and Marengo. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
